Text: Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,
Lo, kʼe̩ fʼakoya ta kʼabo Je̩rusale̩m du ki gbo̩, kakini, Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩, kakini,
Israe̩l la fo̩ todu Jihofa,
Me̩ ki gbʼo̩la Jihofa, O abo unyi Jeko̩b, kpai akwo̩ra unyi akwo̩rʼunyi abo Israe̩l chaka.
Abu ki Jihofa ka de̩ kakini:
Ama la ka n kakini, Ugbo Jihofa kʼi ko wa kwʼoj ane̩ Ijipti wa de̩ ta?
Oñ u ko me̩ wa ane̩ uro̩je̩,
Amatama la ka n kakini, Ugbo Jihofa de̩?
Todule̩ nako bʼame̩ ta, Jihofa ka-i,
Todu, me̩ daba nyʼala Saipro̩s ku me̩ go,
I nʼabo uche̩ichiʼka ki fʼamo̩jo̩-ma kpailo̩?
Awuwu ki fʼe̩ mu, O efojale, efojale tod e̩wñ-i,
todu amone̩-mi fʼe̩wñ bie̩ne̩ meji che:
Israe̩l mud adu? Adu ku ma bi unyi i che?
Amo̩midu nuka rʼowñ o̩la,
Amo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ Me̩mfis kpai Tafanhes
I chʼuwe̩ onugo kʼe̩wñ-i wa bʼo̩la-we̩ oji ma
Oñ ifai, e̩wñ e̩ ne̩ ej o̩na Ijipti?
E̩wñ bibi e-we̩ onugo akʼuwe̩ o̩la,
Todu akwʼigbegbele u fʼoli uno̩lo̩-we̩ guche̩,
Uwe̩ muda chʼikeli achiwebe̩te̩ma ochochi kʼu ne,
Todu dagba kʼe̩ dʼalo gwʼo̩la-we̩,
Ab e̩ le kʼe̩ kakini, O̩la-mi daji n?
o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ efoko kʼo̩la-wñ chema aje̩tachi,
Fʼe̩re̩-we̩ de ki we ete̩ ofo
Alu kʼanyo̩ amu ajoji e̩gba kʼamone̩ fʼu li,
ku ma la ka ñw oli kakini, Ata-mi e̩ che,
Ugbo amo̩jo̩-we̩
E̩wñ chi ku me̩ akobʼumi?
Egwo kʼomi gwo amo̩ma-me̩ chʼofofo,
O abo̩gba-i, me̩ ki go o̩la Jihofa.
Igbe̩le̩ ki ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n neke gbenyo̩ e̩wñ ijaga-wñ?
Go alu kʼe̩ fʼo̩na-we̩ da nyo̩nyo̩,
Ma ño̩ fʼe̩bie̩ onugo ame̩nale
e̩ muda aka kʼe̩ chʼabu du n, kpo̩;
Gʼabu kʼe̩ tara tʼemi tʼemi
E̩ ñʼakʼo̩wo̩ mʼoji
